*******ALL SOLD****


I hope to sell this cards as a lot to make this easier so have made the price for individual cards more expensive.
Individual cards will be $10 each
The group of trimmed cards will be $98
The group of untrimmed cards will be $77
All cards would be $150

Shipping is $2 for individual cards, $5 for lots.
Checks prefered, paypal ok but add 3%.
